Package org.ops4j.peaberry.util

Optional helper methods.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractDecorator<S> Skeletal implementation to simplify development of ImportDecorators.
AbstractScope<S> Skeletal implementation to simplify development of ServiceScopes.
Attributes Methods for dealing with service attributes.
Decorators Methods for creating various general purpose ImportDecorators.
Filters Methods for dealing with AttributeFilters.
TypeLiterals Methods for creating TypeLiterals that can be used with peaberry.
